Banjul

03 Apr 2014

Banjul is the capital of Gambia.

Process

Banjul means ‘fibre’, from the fibrous ropes the local people used to make. It seemed natural to make a rope based letter.

I have to admit being somewhat inspired by the Designtuts article on making a pattern brush with Illustrator even if I did end up using someone else’s brush instead.

 
« Bangui
